Class WorkingSetManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.mybatis.spring.support.SqlSessionDaoSupport

            • com.intland.codebeamer.manager.WorkingSetManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.intland.codebeamer.license.LicenseAware, EntityManager, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class WorkingSetManager
extends AbstractEntityManagerImpl
    Business Layer working set management.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dao.AbstractDao

        com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dao.AbstractDao.CacheEntryBuilder<T>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CONFIGURATION_MEMBER
      Constant to switch WorkingSetManager to I'm a member mode: user will see only the projects he is a member of.
      static int CONFIGURATION_WORKINGSET
      Constant to switch WorkingSetManager to normal mode: user will see the projects defined in the current working set, or all available projects.
